page.title: 07A DAY IN THE LIFE OF...
page.content: I get up at about seven thirty in the morning and get dressed.Next I go down to get washed and have my breakfast then I pack my violin and catch the bus. I get to school about eight thirty. Our first subject on a Friday is maths then we have play. After play we have language then play. Our next subject is art and craft. At two thirty we have our last play then games. I go to cricket.We usually play a match. Then it is time to catch the bus home . When I get home I feed my rabbits and my mouse. I feed my rabbits on grass and pellets and my mouse on hamster food. After I've fed my pets I ride my bike and watch the television until five thirty when I go horse riding. I get back at about seven thirty and then I ride my bike and watch the television and practise my violin.
